description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget screen named RecordsScreen, which displays placeholders for medical records. It includes internal components like _RecordPlaceholder, and references Flutter's material library for UI elements.

classes.name: RecordsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a screen with a title and placeholders for medical records.

classes.name: _RecordPlaceholder
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget that displays a placeholder card for individual medical records.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for RecordsScreen and _RecordPlaceholder widgets.
